title: Sun Devils are back - we game day together!
content: Football season is here! Join us for game day festivities, tailgating, and showing our Sun Devil pride. Wear your maroon and gold!

title: Homecoming at ASU
content: Homecoming week is November 25-30! Join us for parades, concerts, spirit events, and the big game. Don't miss out on ASU's biggest celebration of the year!

title: Spring 2026 Group Registration Opens
content: Start planning for next semester! Group registration for Spring 2026 opens December 1st. Renew your memberships and explore new organizations.
